meanings.definition: Chorographers: a person who practices the art of describing or mapping a region or district.
meanings.sent1: The chorographers carefully mapped out the new hiking trail in the forest.
meanings.sent2: She studied to become one of the best chorographers in the country.
meanings.sent3: The chorographers decided to draw a map of the neighborhood using only crayons.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a chorographer, creating intricate mental maps of the city.
meanings.sent5: The group of chorographers used colorful flags to mark different landmarks on the map.

meanings.definition: Chorographers: the art or practice of describing or mapping a region or district.
meanings.sent1: Learning about chorographers helped the students understand geography better.
meanings.sent2: The book on chorographers explained the history of mapmaking in detail.
meanings.sent3: In art class, they tried to recreate the style of famous chorographers on their own maps.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling had the precision and detail of a skilled chorographer.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition showcased the work of talented chorographers from around the world.
